column4: this is rephrase no impatient.. i just installed ubuntu6.06... i have installed vlc player.... how do i make it the default player instead of totem...? when i double on a asdf.mov file... totem shows up... and could not play the file... i was trying to view the interview of www.joost.com i downloaded....
right click, open with..., select your playter of choice and check the 'use as default' checkbox
nautilus is the filemanager for gnome (and therefore ubuntu)
